task.title: Source material for this book
task.shortdesc: The DITA source XML code is available online on collaborative code hosting website Github.

section.p: Download the DITA source from . Please use the source in any of your own learning materials and improve it as you need to.
I hesitate to say "study it", because this book isn't designed as an exemplar of good DITA coding style. Instead, use the source to learn the basics or to provide basics to others.
